meaningMnemonic: You tie a piece of <radical>thread</radical> to your <radical>turkey</radical> in order to <kanji>maintain</kanji> proximity to it. The turkey likes to run away, so you tie a thread to it. This way you can hold the other end and maintain your turkey.
readingMnemonic: The reason the turkey is tugging is because there’s an <reading>ea</reading>gle (い) swooping down to attack the turkey. You try to <kanji>maintain</kanji> control, but once you see the eagle as well, you let go of the thread.
